author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Tuesday announced that water from Bhavanisagar dam would be released for irrigation from today (January 13). “Following representations from farmers, I have ordered for releasing water from the Bhavanisagar dam from January 13,” Ms. Jayalalithaa said in a statement. The water release from Bhavanisagar would benefit over 1.03 lakh acre lands in Erode, Tiruppur and Karur districts.
title: Water release from Bhavanisagar dam today
